pages.text: Woot allows you to spawn and kill monsters efficiently. By creating a multiblock factory, you can have it internally spawn monsters, kill them, and collect the drops. To read more about this mod, read the $(item)Woot Guide$().

pages.title: Mob factories
pages.text: Mob factories are the central multiblock in this mod, allowing you to farm mobs with a simple setup (and low server load). Each factory is programmed to spawn and kill a single mob. However, modifying a factory to spawn a different monster simply means replacing the Factory Controller with another one.
